context_bundle.summary: Advanced clipboard patterns: security (clear after sensitive data), cross-app transfer with timing delays (100-500ms after Ctrl+C), clipboard monitoring loops, format handling (text vs HTML vs RTF), 64MB size limit, RDP clipboard issues

onboarding.quick_start: Get Clipboard -> Store in var IMMEDIATELY -> Process -> Clear Clipboard (security). Add Wait 0.5s after Ctrl+C operations.
common_patterns: Get Clipboard -> Store -> Clear (sensitive data pattern)
Wait 0.5s after Send Keys Ctrl+C (clipboard population delay)
Loop: Store prev -> Wait -> Get current -> If changed [process] (monitoring)
Clipboard chaining: Get -> Set -> Paste -> Get result -> Set -> Paste (multi-app)
known_errors: Clipboard in use - retry with delays
Large data >64MB fails silently - use file transfer
RDP clipboard redirection may be disabled
Rich text/formatting lost - Get Clipboard Text returns plain text only
